Title: Marlina the Murderer in Four Acts
Writer: Rama Adi, Garin Nugroho, Mouly Surya
Actors: Egy Fedly, Dea Panendra, Yoga Pratama, Haydar Salishz
Plot: Marlina lives quietly in Sumba until one day a man named Markus and his gang try to rob her house and she kills him. Eventually, she is haunted by Markus, and her life turns in 180 degrees.
